GSD.description:
xen/console: harden hvc_xen against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.88 by commit 8fa3a370cc2af858a9ba662ca4f2bd0917550563. For more details please see the references link.
